sources.title: The Girl from Monterrey (1943) FIGHT FILM
sources.description:
Stars: Armida, Edgar Kennedy, Veda Ann Borg 
Director: Wallace Fox

A Mexican club singer finds that her younger brother is a talented boxer and becomes his manager. He slugs his way to the top, but when he is forced to take a fall in bout fixed, the fiery Latina shows her own fighting prowess and goes to the mat for her brother.

metadata.Plot: Mexican club singer Lita Valdez is amazed to find that her younger brother Alberto is a talented boxer and is even more thrilled by his consistent success in the ring. Till he is forced to fight Jerry O'Leary, the man she loves. Caught between her devotion to both men, Lita tries her best to have the match canceled, but there is much more to the boxing racket than she had ever imagined...
metadata.Writer: Robert Gordon, George Green, Arthur Hoerl
metadata.Actors: Armida, Edgar Kennedy, Veda Ann Borg
